titleStmt.title: Gardiner S. Hutchinson to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2719

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives

creation.placeName: New York, New York County, New York

body.p:
G. S. HUTCHINSON,
Attorney & Counsellor at Law,
38 WALL STREET,
New=York, February 25 1862

To
His Excellency Gov. Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky.

On examining my papers I perceive that my appointment as Commissioner in New York for the State of Kentucky will expire on the 16" of March 1862. I should esteem it a great favor if your Excellency would reappoint me as such Commissioner and I herewith enclose the legal fee (Five Dollars -- )
Hoping soon to receive my new Commission I subscribe myself

Your obedt. Servt.
Gardiner S. Hutchinson

New York
Comr. of Deeds
G. S. Hutchinson
"City"
Appd. Mar. 5th 1862
